languages.text: Кьява Гамма очистилась от былого осквернения, но не от мрачной памяти о нем. Священные цеха не умолкали ни на миг, выдавая миллионы тонн продукции, норма выработки стала высшим законом. Слава Империума ковалась в крови и поту тружеников, и жернова мануфакторумов смалывали работников тысяча за тысячей. Даже после смерти души слуг не смели отступить от станков.

Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.
languages.original_text: Кьява Гамма очистилась от былого осквернения, но не от мрачной памяти о нем. Священные цеха не умолкали ни на миг, выдавая миллионы тонн продукции, норма выработки стала высшим законом. Слава Империума ковалась в крови и поту тружеников, и жернова мануфакторумов смалывали работников тысяча за тысячей. Даже после смерти души слуг не смели отступить от станков.

languages.text: 基亚瓦伽马星净化了原本的污点，但却无法洗刷掉曾经黑暗的记忆。所有生产殿堂没有一刻闲暇，生产效率成为了指引一切的最高法则。帝国的荣耀由辛勤劳动者的血汗铸就，而制造工厂的工作仿佛沉重的磨盘一样，碾碎了成千上万的工人。即便是死后，那些仆人的灵魂也不敢离开他们负责操作的机器。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.

traits.locale_text: 基亚瓦伽马星净化了原本的污点，但却无法洗刷掉曾经黑暗的记忆。所有生产殿堂没有一刻闲暇，生产效率成为了指引一切的最高法则。帝国的荣耀由辛勤劳动者的血汗铸就，而制造工厂的工作仿佛沉重的磨盘一样，碾碎了成千上万的工人。即便是死后，那些仆人的灵魂也不敢离开他们负责操作的机器。

languages.text: キアヴァ・ガンマはかつての汚染の染みを洗い流したが、その暗い思い出は洗い流せなかった。聖なるホールが静かになることはなく、生産率が最高法規となった。帝国の栄光はあくせく働く者の血と汗の上に成り立ち、聖工場のマイルストーンは何千もの労働者を苦しめた。死の時にあっても、しもべ達の魂は機械から離れようとはしなかった。
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.

traits.locale_text: キアヴァ・ガンマはかつての汚染の染みを洗い流したが、その暗い思い出は洗い流せなかった。聖なるホールが静かになることはなく、生産率が最高法規となった。帝国の栄光はあくせく働く者の血と汗の上に成り立ち、聖工場のマイルストーンは何千もの労働者を苦しめた。死の時にあっても、しもべ達の魂は機械から離れようとはしなかった。

languages.text: Kiava Gamma effaça son ancienne souillure, mais pas son sombre souvenir. Les salles sacrées ne connurent jamais le silence, et la productivité devint la loi suprême. La gloire de l'Imperium fut forgée dans le sang et la sueur de ses travailleurs, et les meules des manufactorums broyèrent des ouvriers par milliers. Même dans la mort, les âmes des serviteurs n'osaient pas s'éloigner de leurs machines.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma effaça son ancienne souillure, mais pas son sombre souvenir. Les salles sacrées ne connurent jamais le silence, et la productivité devint la loi suprême. La gloire de l'Imperium fut forgée dans le sang et la sueur de ses travailleurs, et les meules des manufactorums broyèrent des ouvriers par milliers. Même dans la mort, les âmes des serviteurs n'osaient pas s'éloigner de leurs machines.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma se purificó de su anterior corrupción, pero no de su recuerdo. Los salones sagrados nunca guardaron silencio y los ratios de producción se convirtieron en la ley suprema. La gloria del Imperium se forjó con la sangre y el sudor de sus trabajadores mientras los engranajes de los manufactorums molían a miles de ellos. Incluso en la muerte, las almas de sus sirvientes no osaban alejarse de sus máquinas.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma se purificó de su anterior corrupción, pero no de su recuerdo. Los salones sagrados nunca guardaron silencio y los ratios de producción se convirtieron en la ley suprema. La gloria del Imperium se forjó con la sangre y el sudor de sus trabajadores mientras los engranajes de los manufactorums molían a miles de ellos. Incluso en la muerte, las almas de sus sirvientes no osaban alejarse de sus máquinas.

languages.text: Kiava Gamma entfernte den Makel seiner früheren Schändung, aber nicht die dunkle Erinnerung daran. Die heiligen Hallen standen niemals still, und Produktionsvorgaben wurden zum obersten Gesetz. Der Ruhm des Imperiums wurde im Blut und Schweiß der Arbeiter geschmiedet, und die Mühlsteine der Manufactorien zerrieben diese zu Tausenden. Selbst im Tod wagten die Seelen der Diener nicht, ihre Maschinen zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.

traits.locale_text: Kiava Gamma entfernte den Makel seiner früheren Schändung, aber nicht die dunkle Erinnerung daran. Die heiligen Hallen standen niemals still, und Produktionsvorgaben wurden zum obersten Gesetz. Der Ruhm des Imperiums wurde im Blut und Schweiß der Arbeiter geschmiedet, und die Mühlsteine der Manufactorien zerrieben diese zu Tausenden. Selbst im Tod wagten die Seelen der Diener nicht, ihre Maschinen zu verlassen.

languages.text: Kiava Gama eski kirliliğinin izlerini üzerinden attı ancak bu döneme dair karanlık anıları zihinlerden temizleyemedi. Kutsal salonlar asla sükûnete eremedi ve üretim oranları baş kanun hâline geldi. İmparatorluk'un şanı buranın işçilerinin kanıyla ve teriyle yükseldi. Manufaktorumların değirmen taşları, işçileri biner biner öğütüyordu. Hizmetkârlarının ruhları, öldükten sonra bile makinelerden uzaklaşamıyordu.
languages.original_text: Kiava Gamma washed off the stain of its former defilement, but not the dark memory of it. The sacred halls were never silent, and production rates became the supreme law. The glory of the Imperium was forged in the blood and sweat of its toilers, and the millstones of the manufactorums ground the workers down by the thousand. Even in death, the souls of its servants dared not step away from their machines.
